content: this classic granny rectangle blanket is perfect for beginners and a versatile project for any crocheter using simple double_crochet stitches this pattern is adaptable to any size from baby blankets to large throws whether you choose dk or worsted weight yarn this pattern works up quickly and easily making it a go-to project for those looking to create something cozy and beautiful the pattern includes an easy-to-follow formula allowing you to customize the size of your rectangle blanket effortlessly with its straightforward construction and timeless design this granny rectangle blanket is sure to become a favorite in your crochet repertoire skill level beginner yarn dk or worsted weight hook suggested hook size for your yarn stitches used double_crochet customization easily adjustable for any size rectangle
